free.name: Free Plan
free.description: Perfect for trying out the platform

q1.question: What languages are supported?
q1.answer: Currently supports Traditional Chinese and English content. The system automatically detects the language and generates corresponding dialogue scripts.

q2.question: Is voice cloning secure?
q2.answer: We use industry-leading ElevenLabs API for voice cloning. All voice samples are encrypted and stored securely, used only for your account's podcast generation and never for other purposes.

q3.question: What's the difference between Free and Pro plans?
q3.answer: Free plan allows 3 podcasts per month with default voices only. Pro plan offers unlimited generation, voice cloning, and priority processing.

q4.question: How long does it take to generate a podcast?
q4.answer: Script generation typically takes 30 seconds to 1 minute. Audio synthesis takes 2-5 minutes depending on length. You can leave the page during the wait, and the system will save your progress.

q5.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
q5.answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime. After cancellation, you'll retain your remaining monthly quota, and no charges will occur in the following month.
